forum.name: Reflecting on Session 5.5
forum.intro:
In Session 5.5, we examined summaries from lessons about transformations and worked on an activity about identifying similar triangles. The overarching goal of Session 5.5 was to connect transformations to congruence and similarity, emphasizing that the results of transformations are predictable and dependable.

Share 1–2 takeaways from Session 5.5 in the discussion forum below. Click ADD DISCUSSION TOPIC to add a post to the forum.

Remember to read and respond to others’ postings. (Click “Discuss this topic” on an individual post, then click “Reply” to respond to that post.)
